gw.api.webservice.cc.messagingTools

Class CCMessagingToolsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.webservice.messagingTools.MessagingToolsImpl
      • gw.api.webservice.cc.messagingTools.CCMessagingToolsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessagingToolsBase

    public class CCMessagingToolsImpl
extends MessagingToolsImpl
    Implementation of MessagingToolsAPI for CC. MessagingTools is a remote interface to a set of tools to get messaging statistics and perform operations on messages.

    • Method Detail

      • resyncClaim

        public void resyncClaim(int destID,
                        java.lang.String claimID)
                 throws DataConversionException
        Resync the claim against specified destination
        Parameters:
        destID - The destination against which the claim should be resynced.
        claimID - The identifier of the claim that should be resynced.
        Throws:
        DataConversionException - if claim cannot be found
        SOAPException
